Nkwekọrịta mmekọrịta afọ ofufo (VPA) bụ nkwekọrịta ahia ahia nke abụọ n'etiti European Union na osisi - mba na-ebupụ na mpụga EU
VPA bụ isi ihe na mmemme EU FLEGT Atumatu mmemme nke bu n'obi ilebara iwu na-akwadoghi anya igbu osisi.
N'okpuru VPA, mba mmekọ ahụ kwenyere na ọ ga-ebupụ naanị ngwaahịa osisi iwu kwadoro na EU

EU kwenyere inye ngwaahịa osisi iwu kwadoro ('FLEGT-likensed) site na mba ahụ n'efu ịbanye n'ahịa EU. EU na-ekwukwa na ọ ga-agọnahụ ịbanye na mbupu osisi ọ bụla sitere na mba mmekọ VPA nke na-enweghị ikikere FLEGT ma yabụ na ọ gafere iwu na-akwadoghị.

Ebumnuche bụ iji azụmahịa mee ihe dị ka ihe mkpali, dịka osisi nwere ikikere FLEGT na-emezu ihe achọrọ nke EU Timber Regulation, nke chọrọ ka ndị ọrụ EU jiri ịdị uchu iji gbochie osisi iwu na-akwadoghị ịbanye n'ahịa
Osisi nwere ikikere FLEGT agaghị enwe nyocha ndị ahụ n'ihi ya ga-enwe ọkụ na-acha akwụkwọ ndụ akwụkwọ ndụ iji banye na EU.
Isi nke VPA ọ bụla bụ nkọwa nke usoro nkwenye iwu osisi nke mba mmekọ ga-etinye n'ọrụ iji nyochaa iwu nke ngwaahịa osisi ma nye ngwaahịa iwu kwadoro na ikikere FLEGT
Usoro nkwenye iwu ọ bụla nke osisi ga-enwerịrị ihe ise na-esonụ: nkọwa iwu, njikwa usoro nnyefe, nkwenye nke nkwenye, ikikere FLEGT na nyocha onwe onye nke usoro ahụ dum.
